field_text.value: A common use case for layouts is that one column will be empty, while the other has content in it. In these cases, there's usually a background image that takes up the empty space, and it disappears or becomes less-usefully smaller on tablet and mobile. For these layouts, the empty column (a column containing only one spacer) will disappear entirely when you get to mobile view.
